body:
Hi Tim It's a micro bug, I'm going to fix it as soon as possible. Meanwhile, I suggest you do in this way: change the name of the input "exportinteriorWalls" to "**exportAirWalls_**". [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Z7Xreoa3jY25VXRhLCRijwkoOH8OuPtrs2bfX980o*1Ff2Df*aKOw9D3q*NsM2Fd3jToUUT6d0rv9ArgOAYiiw7xVf1HVqXE/fixtemporarelly.png) the simulation will run correctly and, although a new balloon message will appear, you will see the results.
I should ask Mostapha about this warning message (non planar vertices). [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Z7Xreoa3jY3ol43MNpCk4VSVdB5r-ToIxc2ICCYiS4tBuaJ9ca*j*nrjyTMaVdMvywrj81CqH7QmBtieSMXS7hNInqFuIv3M/fixtemporarelly01.png) best Antonello
